org.apache.beam.sdk.values.PCollectionView

  • Packages that use PCollectionView 
    Package Description
    org.apache.beam.runners.dataflow.util  
    org.apache.beam.runners.direct  
    org.apache.beam.sdk.runners
    Defines runners for executing Pipelines in different modes, including DirectPipelineRunner and org.apache.beam.sdk.runners.DataflowPipelineRunner.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.testing
    Defines utilities for unit testing Dataflow pipelines.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms
    Defines PTransforms for transforming data in a pipeline.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.util
    Defines utilities used by the Dataflow SDK.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.util.state

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  PCollectionViews.IterablePCollectionView<T,W extends BoundedWindow>
      Implementation of conversion Iterable<WindowedValue<T>> to Iterable<T>.
      static class  PCollectionViews.ListPCollectionView<T,W extends BoundedWindow>
      Implementation of conversion Iterable<WindowedValue<T>> to List<T>.
      static class  PCollectionViews.MapPCollectionView<K,V,W extends BoundedWindow>
      Implementation of conversion Iterable<WindowedValue<KV<K, V>> with one value per key to Map<K, V>.
      static class  PCollectionViews.MultimapPCollectionView<K,V,W extends BoundedWindow>
      Implementation of conversion Iterable<WindowedValue<KV<K, V>>> to Map<K, Iterable<V>>.
      static class  PCollectionViews.SingletonPCollectionView<T,W extends BoundedWindow>
      Implementation of conversion of singleton Iterable<WindowedValue<T>> to T.
